channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: One doctor's experience shows the battle for the future of addiction medicine
item.description: The experiences of one doctor in Louisiana reveal the tensions around trying to get people to engage in addiction treatment, even if they're not ready...

item.title: New redesigned coins marking nation's 250th birthday begin circulating today
item.description: New coins marking the United States' 250th anniversary begin circulating this week. The Trump administration tweaked the design of some coins and is c...

item.title: In the U.S., hunger is often hidden. But it can still leave scars on body and mind
item.description: In the U.S., hunger is often hidden away. It looks nothing like the stereotype of a famine happening overseas. But the physical impacts on health and ...

item.title: Trial Begins for Former Officer Over Uvalde School Shooting Response
item.description: Families of the victims and survivors of the 2022 elementary school shooting in Texas are expected to testify.

item.title: After Venezuela, Trump Offers Hints About What Could Be Next
item.description: President Trump’s comments about Greenland, Colombia and Cuba offered a glimpse of how emboldened he feels after the quick capture of Nicolás Maduro.

item.title: 7 takeaways from Trump's incursion into Venezuela
item.description: President Trump says the U.S. will now "run" Venezuela after capturing its leader. Here's how the politics could play out at home.

item.title: Supreme Court Increasingly Favors the Rich, Economists Say

item.title: Dimon’s $770 Million Windfall Shows How Banking Is Great Again
item.description: The Trump administration is lifting regulations, and deal making is heating up. For Jamie Dimon, being JPMorgan Chase’s chief executive was more lucra...

item.title: Gunboat Diplomacy Is Back. What Could Go Wrong?
item.description: The high cost of forgetting what world war is really like.

item.title: 2 police officers relive Jan. 6 through their own bodycam footage
item.description: D.C. police officers experienced some of the most intense violence during the attack on the U.S. Capitol on Jan. 6, 2021. We sat down with two of them...

item.title: 10 People Convicted of Cyberbullying Brigitte Macron, Wife of French President
item.description: The defendants made false claims about Brigitte Macron, the wife of President Emmanuel Macron of France.

item.title: After Venezuela, Trump Says Cuba Is ‘Ready to Fall’
item.description: The capture of Nicolás Maduro is a devastating blow to the alliance between Venezuela and Cuba. Many wonder if the island nation will be targeted next...

item.title: Who Is Venezuela’s New Interim Leader?
item.description: Who is Delcy Rodríguez, Venezuela’s interim leader? Anatoly Kurmanaev, a reporter covering Venezuela, describes what we know.
